Entries.default: "Kill 'em, wait an hour, then pull any gold teeth. Easy as pie!"
"You're an idiot. Wait a minute, wait an hour. Alive, dead. Makes no difference at all."
"I've pulled plenty of gold teeth. I know the right way of it."
"Maybe I'll pull your teeth just to prove you wrong."
"What do you know - it really does make no difference."
